question: A museum near your home is looking for people to do part-time voluntary/unpaid work. You would like to do some voluntary/unpaid work at the museum. Write a letter to the museum director to apply for the voluntary/unpaid work. In your letter explain why you want to do voluntary/unpaid work at the museum, describe some skills and qualities you have that would be useful and give details of when you would be available to work.
text: This letter is being written in response to your requirement for someone to do part-time unpaid work at your museum.

Yesterday, I came across your advertisement requiring an individual for voluntary work. I was looking for such an opportunity for a long time. Being an accountant, I need experience for a few months to apply for my permanent residence y in Australia.

I have completed my bachelor in accounts and business management from India. Owing to that fact,  I have the front and back knowledge of managing finance. This skill will aid you in managing and calculating expenditure annually.
I would like to tell you that I will be free from 21st October.  I will be available only in the afternoons as keeping evenings for myself.
I hope you will take me into consideration. Waiting for a positive response from your side soon
